title: title - moonfly (INDIE)
description:
title - MOONFLY

Moonfly is a pop-electronic record that embraces many forms of Dance, Electronic and Urban music. From Euro to Retro, Trip Hop to House, Big Beat to Trance \"title\" grabs bits from it all. With the assistance of producer John Punter (Roxy Music, Japan, Bryan Ferry) title couldn\&#039;t go wrong. His internationally respected producing skills shine on this record beyond comprehension.


Tracks:
1. Moonfly
2. Wednesday
3. Oh Yeah
4. La La Land
5. Touch the Sky
6. And I Wonder
7. Magical (Retro)
8. Delirious
9. Never
10. Sway
11. Just Can\&#039;t Get Enough [Boomtang Boys Dance Remix]

Bonus Tracks:
12. Wednesday [Boomtang Remix]
13. Title - Wednesday (BeeZed soft Radio Mix)
14. title - Wednesday (peace on moon remix)



Inject Depeche Mode with a shot of happiness, or Coldplay with some electronic beats and computer-induced sounds, and you have the essence of Title. Songwriter and beatmaster Hugo Bugg (aka DJ Laketrout) laces the tracks, while Dileas provides good-natured vocals. Comparisons to Erasure, the Pet Shop Boys, Royksopp, and Aqua come to mind. Title\&#039;s last album \"Moonfly\" was completed with producer John Punter. After a much deserved rest, the boys are back at work recording a string of new tracks due out for the summer of 2008.
